product_desc:
CryptoMove is programmatic API-based distributed file storage security. Its core continuous concealment technology cryptographically mutates stored data content and re-encrypts moving file parts around the distributed data store.  Because of this dynamic approach, no attacker can identify data of interest, and sensitive data can safely go to the cloud.  

CryptoMove will make all data-at-rest encryption a thing of the past. CryptoMove's dynamic security approach loses attackers in a sea of obfuscation. Unlocks enterprise movement of sensitive files to the cloud. Securely stores files in AWS (or local networks or other clouds). Best way to secure encryption keys to legacy static data-at-rest encryption technologies.

We're working with multiple pilot customers who want a simple programmatic white-label API to store sensitive user or other data backups via CryptoMove in the cloud.

FAQ:  https://goo.gl/3xXLV1.  Bootstrapped development to date.
high_concept: Programmatic API-based cloud storage security via distributed data concealment.
name: CryptoMove
